A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe the negative reviews. Although I am a fan of both Star Wars and Star Trek\, I guess I'm just not a \"superfan\"  but fewer people liked it compared with Episode 1? LOL. I'm sorry\, but this movie was fantastic. I loved it. It was amazing to see and hear on and IMax screen and was very satisfying. It was a far superior to Force Awakens which I very much enjoyed but can't say that I loved. To each his own\, I suppose\, but I want to see it again.
